html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-10182023-10-06FIN
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectDirect Shipment (Most-Favoured-Nation Tariff, General Preferential Tariff, General Preferential Tariff Plus, Least Developed Country Tariff, Commonwealth Caribbean Countries Tariff, Australia Tariff and New Zealand Tariff) Regulations
PrecisDIRECT SHIPMENT (MOST-FAVOURED-NATION TARIFF, GENERAL PREFERENTIAL TARIFF, GENERAL PREFERENTIAL TARIFF PLUS, LEAST DEVELOPED COUNTRY TARIFF, COMMONWEALTH CARIBBEAN COUNTRIES TARIFF, AUSTRALIA TARIFF AND NEW ZEALAND TARIFF) REGULATIONS in order to reinstate direct shipment and transhipment requirements to broaden the types of documentation that can serve as proof that goods were shipped directly to Canada, as well as to remove the time limit on the storage of goods in an intermediary country.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0212 Publication Date: 2023-10-25
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Direct Shipment (Most-Favoured-Nation Tariff, General Preferential Tariff, General Preferential Tariff Plus, Least Developed Country Tariff, Commonwealth Caribbean Countries Tariff, Australia Tariff and New Zealand Tariff) Regulations
precis: DIRECT SHIPMENT (MOST-FAVOURED-NATION TARIFF, GENERAL PREFERENTIAL TARIFF, GENERAL PREFERENTIAL TARIFF PLUS, LEAST DEVELOPED COUNTRY TARIFF, COMMONWEALTH CARIBBEAN COUNTRIES TARIFF, AUSTRALIA TARIFF AND NEW ZEALAND TARIFF) REGULATIONS in order to reinstate direct shipment and transhipment requirements to broaden the types of documentation that can serve as proof that goods were shipped directly to Canada, as well as to remove the time limit on the storage of goods in an intermediary country.
